name: Save the world in the most anticlimactic way
name_original: Save the world in the most anticlimactic way
description:
FOR WINDOWS MAKE SURE TO RUN THE EXE FILE WITHOUT REMOVING/MOVING ANYTHING

You, a young little mute knight is off to save the world just like your 512 different siblings who also saved the world. The difference between mute youths and you is that mute youths are WAY stronger with sword than you. But that all changes when you stumble upon a... glock? slaughter your way through 4 levels and reach the xaranq to save the world! Good luck young one.
